code: import{useEffect}from"react";import"./HateListItem.scss";import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{chooseHate,removeHate}from"../../redux/action";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const HateListItem=_ref=>{let{item}=_ref;const dispatch=useDispatch();const stateHateArr=useSelector(state=>state.hateArr);const changeStyles=target=>{target.classList.add("checkedParent");target.children[1].classList.add("checkedChild");target.children[1].style.backgroundColor="#e4229b";};useEffect(()=>{const listItems=document.querySelectorAll("li");stateHateArr.forEach(el=>{listItems.forEach(li=>{if(li.textContent===el){changeStyles(li);}});});},[]);const handleClick=e=>{const target=e.target.closest("li");if(target.classList.contains("checkedParent")){target.classList.remove("checkedParent");target.children[1].classList.remove("checkedChild");target.children[1].style.backgroundColor="#6d4376";const index=stateHateArr.indexOf(target.textContent);const newArr=[...stateHateArr];newArr.splice(index,1);dispatch(removeHate(newArr));}else{changeStyles(target);dispatch(chooseHate(target.textContent));}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{onClick:e=>handleClick(e),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:item}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"checkbox"})]});};
